Package i5.las2peer.services.gamificationStreakService

Class GamificationStreakService

java.lang.Object
i5.las2peer.api.Configurable
i5.las2peer.api.Service
i5.las2peer.restMapper.RESTService
i5.las2peer.services.gamificationStreakService.GamificationStreakService
public class GamificationStreakService extends i5.las2peer.restMapper.RESTService
Gamification Streak Service This is Gamification Streak Service to manage streak element in Gamification Framework It uses the LAS2peer Web-Connector for RESTful access to it. Note: If you plan on using Swagger you should adapt the information below in the ApiInfo annotation to suit your project. If you do not intend to provide a Swagger documentation of your service API, the entire ApiInfo annotation should be removed.

      @POST @Path("/{gameId}") @Produces("application/json") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createNewStreak(@PathParam("gameId") String gameId, byte[] content)
      Post a new streak. It consumes JSON data.
      Parameters:
      gameId - gameId
      content - content JSON
      Returns:
      HTTP Response returned as JSON object

      Get a streak with specific ID from database
      Parameters:

      streakId - streak id
      Returns:
      HTTP Response returned as JSON object

    • updateStreak

      Parameters:

    • deleteStreak

      @DELETE @Path("/{gameId}/{streakId}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response deleteStreak(@PathParam("gameId") String gameId, @PathParam("streakId") String streakId)

      Parameters:
      gameId - gameId

      Returns:
      HTTP Response returned as JSON object

    • getStreakList

      @GET @Path("/{gameId}") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getStreakList(@PathParam("gameId") String gameId, @QueryParam("current") int currentPage, @QueryParam("rowCount") int windowSize, @QueryParam("searchPhrase") String searchPhrase)
      Get a list of streaks from database
      Parameters:
      gameId - Game ID obtained from Gamification Game Service
      currentPage - current cursor page
      windowSize - size of fetched data (use -1 to fetch all data)
      searchPhrase - search word
      Returns:
      HTTP Response returned as JSON object

      streakId - streakId
      Returns:
